channel.title: Two hand help
channel.description: I need help fixing two handed items..when you put on a two handed sword, it removes the shield item but you can put it back on. do i have to make it remove character equip 5 when you put on a two hand..?

item.title: Two hand help
item.dc:creator: @sickamore sickamore
item.description:
@sickamore wrote:

I need help fixing two handed items…when you put on a two handed sword, it removes the shield item but you can put it back on. do i have to make it remove character equip 5 when you put on a two hand…?
